title: Random account connected to my email?
body: Hello! So I wanted to try and make a new account with a new email for league of legends. right as I finished creating my account it said that my email was already in use, when I just made it. Can someone tell me what may have happened? I can't think of anyway that this random account was just plugged in with my email that I just made.

replies.body: It definitely sounds like a strange situation that your email may already be in use.  I suggest submitting a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) on this so our account team can see what's going on.  They'll take a look and help out!
